33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said:"Black standards will come from Khurasan, nothing shall turn them back until they are planted in Jerusalem

chapter.eng-name: Doing Deeds During Fitan, The Land Of Fitan, And The Signs of Fitan
